item.title: Case Study: Boosting Local Visibility Through Google My Business Optimization
item.dc:creator: Intech Ventures
item.description:
Optimizing the Google My Business profile proved to be a cost-effective strategy for the café to enhance its local visibility and attract more customers. This case underscores the importance of maintaining an up-to-date and engaging online presence for small businesses aiming to thrive in competitive local markets.

The post Case Study: Boosting Local Visibility Through Google My Business Optimization appeared first on Intech Ventures.

item.title: Top 5 Mistakes Startups Make When Launching a Website (and How to Avoid Them)
item.dc:creator: Intech Ventures
item.description:
Starting a new business is exciting. You’ve got your idea, your energy, and your passion. But when it’s time to build your website, things can go wrong very quickly — and most startups don’t even realize it. A website is more than just a digital brochure. It’s often the first impression your audience will have of your brand.

The post Top 5 Mistakes Startups Make When Launching a Website (and How to Avoid Them) appeared first on Intech Ventures.

item.title: Why Every Business in Pakistan Needs a Website in 2025
item.dc:creator: Intech Ventures
item.description:
If you're running a business in Pakistan and still don’t have a website, you’re missing out on a massive opportunity. In 2025, having a website is no longer a luxury. It’s a basic need—just like having a phone number or shop board outside your office.

The post Why Every Business in Pakistan Needs a Website in 2025 appeared first on Intech Ventures.
